import '../../../CSS/Create.css' import { usuarios } from '../../../../../Data' import { createUser } from '../../../../../DataFunctions' export default function CreateUser(){ const handleSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault() createUser(e.target.name.value, e.target.apPat.value, e.target.apMat.value, e.target.password.value, e.target.email.value, e.target.superUser.checked ? 1 : 0) usuarios.push({ idUsuario: usuarios.length + 1, nombre: e.target.name.value, apPat: e.target.apPat.value, apMat: e.target.apMat.value, password: e.target.password.value, email: e.target.email.value, profilePicture: null, superUser: e.target.superUser.checked ? 1 : 0 }) alert('User registered successfully') } return(

Register User

) }
